column1: More than 2000 Americans died of COVID in the last 24 hours.   Trump spent his time pardoning a turkey.  Please.  Just go away.
More than 250K Americans have died from COVID-19.  Do your job Mitch.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act. Now.
For nine straight days.  There have been more than 100000 coronavirus infections.   Trump remains in the witness protection program.  Unreal.
More than 145000 coronavirus cases were reported in the U.S. yesterday.   That’s a record.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act. Now.
COVID-19 is spreading like wildfire.  Trump has given up.  House Dems never will.
More Americans died yesterday from COVID-19.  Than the total number of soldiers killed.  During the last decade in Afghanistan.   America is NOT turning the corner Donald.

More than 8 million Americans have been infected with COVID-19.   Every single one now has a pre-existing condition.  Instead of stealing another Supreme Court seat to take away our healthcare.  Senate Republicans should be working to crush the virus.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act.
The American people are in desperate need of COVID-19 relief.  That’s why House Dems have passed the #HeroesAct.  Twice.  Trump and Senate Republicans are still missing in action.  SHAMEFUL.
These guys couldn’t stop the coronavirus from ravaging the White House.  And we’re supposed to believe the Trump administration can flatten the curve in America?  Get. Lost.
Trump to Americans struggling with COVID-19: Drop Dead.  How much more can we take?  Vote like your life depends on it.
50000 Americans have contracted COVID.  In the last 24 hours.   They also deserve high quality medical care.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act.
COVID-19 is not a hoax.  Best wishes on a swift recovery to the President First Lady and every single American infected by the coronavirus.  Wear. A. Mask.

Trump lied.   Americans died.  The COVID-19 response has been an unmitigated disaster.  What exactly will it take for the sycophants to reach that conclusion?  (Apparently nearly 200000 deaths is not sufficient) https://t.co/ktABbv97v8

The United States has 4% of the world’s population.  But more than 20 percent of COVID-19 related deaths.  More than any other country on earth.   Make America Great Again?  This guy has been an unmitigated disaster.
COVID-19 Pandemic.  Grossly Negligent Response.  Economic Recession.  Children in Cages.   Are we better off today than we were four years ago?
Donald Trump inherited a great economy from @BarackObama.  His incompetence during the #coronavirus pandemic has blown it all.  The American people are paying the price.
Bill Barr called Trump’s coronavirus response “Superb.”  Actually.   It’s been an unmitigated disaster.   The Attorney General has ZERO CREDIBILITY.  Just like his boss. https://t.co/6fOKmYkGqt
The House passed the #HeroesAct on May 15.  Mitch McConnell and the boys have done nothing.   Since that time more than 59000 Americans have died from COVID-19.   Pass. The. Bill.

Republican #coronavirus proposal is a disgrace.  It provides no funding for states and localities.  And more money for private schools than community health centers.  Something is really wrong with these people.
Trump now says that masks are patriotic.   Why did it take more than 140000 coronavirus deaths to state the obvious?
Leadership (or the lack thereof) Matters.  Just ask the people of Florida who are being overrun by #COVID19.  VOTE.  Like your life depends on it.  Your quality of life absolutely depends on it.

More than 3 million Americans infected by the coronavirus.  Over 50 million workers newly unemployed.  State budgets are collapsing throughout the country.  Now would be a good time for the Senate to pass the #HeroesAct.
250000 new COVID-19 cases in five days.  What did the President do about it?  Play golf in Virginia.   SAD.
Senator Rick Scott told New Yorkers to go to hell in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic.  Florida is now being savaged by the virus.  Does the same standard apply?
More than 125K Americans dead.  Over two million Americans infected by the #coronavirus.  47 million Americans unemployed.  Do Your Job Mitch.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act. Now. https://t.co/1byQvuciqE
Surge in #coronavirus infections likely to overwhelm budgets in Texas and Florida.   Can someone ask Mitch if these states should also declare bankruptcy?
Two million Americans have now been infected with the #coronavirus.  Crickets from the White House.  Is this guy still hiding in his bunker?
It’s official.  America is in recession.  Obama built a great economy.  The current President’s incompetent response to #COVID19 broke it.  #TrumpRecession
The coronavirus pandemic is not over.  Senate Republicans think we have forgotten.  We haven’t.  Pass. The. Heroes. Act. Now.

Americans are in streets to protest police brutality.  Trump hides in his bunker.  More than 100 thousand people dead from the #coronavirus.  Trump tries to take healthcare away from 100 million Americans.   Have. You. No. Shame.
One. Hundred. Thousand. Dead. Americans.  May God Bless and Comfort the families of all who have been lost.  #Coronavirus   🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾

The President has threatened to shut down social media companies that fact check his lies.  Doesn’t this guy have anything else to do?  Like for instance address the #coronavirus pandemic that is devastating America.
Nearly 40 million Americans have now lost employment due to the #coronavirus pandemic.   Put down the hydroxychloroquine.  Get something done.  #ForThePeople

More than 100 million Americans have a pre-existing condition.  Their healthcare is protected by the Affordable Care Act.  We are in the midst of a deadly #coronavirus pandemic.  Trump wants to take their healthcare away.  Drop. The. Lawsuit.

More than 90K dead Americans #Coronavirus.  House Dems pass $3 trillion relief package #ForThePeople.  Senate Republicans missing in action.   Trump & his minions busy peddling conspiracy theories #MuellerInvestigation.  FACTS.

Partnering with @NYGovCuomo and houses of worship to launch community-based #coronavirus testing sites.   Weeping may endure for a night but joy will come in the morning.  Psalm 30:5 https://t.co/YNTeVxjbsV

2017: GOP Tax Scam signed into law.  2018: Children put in cages.   2019: Corruptly abuses power by trying to cheat in the next election.   2020: COVID-19 response a total disaster.  Welcome to Trump’s America.

Florida Senator Rick Scott believes states like New York hit hard by #COVID19 should be left on their own.  What a fraud.  Do you think the Federal government should stop sending billions to Florida every time you’re hit by a hurricane?  Take. A. Hike.
The Black Community has been hit particularly hard by the COVID-19 pandemic.  All. Hands. On. Deck.  #ForThePeople   https://t.co/a4Cu26lxjY

The #COVID19 pandemic is a public health crisis.   Tens of thousands have died.  Millions w/ pre-existing health conditions are at greater risk.   Trump administration continues its effort to eradicate healthcare protections in court.   They. Must. Be. Stopped. #ProtectOurCare

Calls to poison control hotlines throughout America have apparently increased significantly.   Ignorance in high places is a dangerous thing.  House Dems are pushing evidence and data-based solutions to the #coronavirus pandemic.  #ForThePeople

The President suggested injecting Lysol into the human body to treat #COVID19.   Something is very wrong with this guy.  No really.  We should be very concerned.  Intervention? https://t.co/hOyy8S0wSi

Heading back to DC to vote on interim emergency COVID-19 legislation.  $370 billion for small businesses ✅   $25 billion to strengthen testing ✅   $75 billion for hospitals & nursing homes ✅   Important step in the right direction. So much more to do #FlattenTheCurve.

America produced an unprecedented amount of warplanes tanks and battleships in the effort to crush Nazi Germany.   But now we can’t manufacture enough cloth masks and cotton swabs to defeat #coronavirus?  Leadership matters.  FDR had it.   It’s missing right now.
Dear Cabinet Officials:  Today’s #coronavirus briefing went from bad to worse.  Deeply troubling.   Some people are saying it may be time to invoke the #25thAmendment.   Thoughts?
The so-called President has one view.  Trump Administration v. The States.  Real leadership requires something else.  America v. COVID-19.  🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
Many on the right dismissed data and importance of science for years.  And now the chickens have come home to roost.   The Trump #coronavirus response has been an unmitigated disaster.   FACTS.

NYC is ground zero #Coronavirus.  Upstate communities were asked to share unused ventilators.  Some self-centered politicians objected.  NYC regularly sends more money upstate than we get back in return.   When this is over perhaps we should #Cancel that. https://t.co/tvxpgy1h7n

The African-American community is being ravaged by #COVID19 in hotspots throughout the nation.  Here we are flying blind.  We cannot properly confront the problem unless we understand the full extent of the problem.  It’s time for New York City to release race specific data.
Stop the xenophobia.  Stop the anti-Asian violence.  Stop the inhumanity.  The only way we will defeat the #COVID19 pandemic is TOGETHER.  #FlattenTheCurve https://t.co/EnquPFOO2C

America now has more #coronavirus cases than any other country in the world.  I am old enough to remember when donald dismissed the seriousness of #COVID19 as a democratic hoax.  Ignorant. Corrupt. Incompetent.   Quite a combination.

The #coronavirus pandemic is ravaging the nation.   People desperately need help.  But Trump continues his effort to take away healthcare from more than 100 million Americans w/ pre-existing conditions.  Drop. The. Lawsuit. Donald.  #ProtectOurCare

People are hurting throughout America #coronavirus.  The President is melting down.  House Dems are focused on direct payments to everyday Americans unemployment assistance to displaced workers and supporting small businesses.  #ForThePeople https://t.co/fPVuKBf43C

Today is #CensusDay (April 1).  I just completed the form online.   It took 10 minutes!  Healthcare professionals first responders and grocery store clerks are WORKING OVERTIME to battle the #coronavirus.  Let’s all spend a few moments to make sure that everyone counts 🇺🇸 🇺🇸 🇺🇸. https://t.co/yirpKWIUk1

The American people are at war with the #coronavirus.  Our doctors nurses healthcare professionals grocery store clerks and first responders are on the frontline.  Why would we send them into battle unarmed?  They ALL need N-95 masks and personal protective equipment.  NOW.

Democracy Matters.  Now more than ever.  That’s why @HouseDemocrats fought to secure $400 million to maximize voter participation during the #coronavirus pandemic.  We need nationwide early voting and mail-in ballots for everyone.  Nothing less is acceptable #ForThePeople.

The #coronavirus relief package is law and the groveling has begun.  For years the major cruise lines have sailed under foreign flags to avoid paying the U.S. corporate tax rate.  They now want the American taxpayer to bail them out.   How can I say this politely?  HELL NO.

The House just passed the #CARESAct to address the #coronavirus pandemic.   America is a resilient nation.   We defeated the Great Depression. We defeated Nazi Germany. We defeated Jim Crow.   We will defeat #COVID19 as well #FlattenTheCurve #ForThePeople. https://t.co/tCpHKMslB7

Back in Washington preparing to vote on the #Coronavirus relief package.  Apparently a right-wing Republican is trying to block it.  This is no time for political gamesmanship.   Lives are at risk.  We. Will. Pass. This. Bill. #ForThePeople. https://t.co/ozTToNhqs1

Republicans are holding up the Coronavirus relief package because of direct payments to displaced employees.  They have never been for everyday Americans.  And they never will be.  House Dems will always stand up #ForThePeople.  We. Will. Prevail.
There is no economy if the Coronavirus overwhelms sickens and kills the American people.  Why is that so complicated for the President to understand?  #SocialDistancing

First the coronavirus is “totally under control.”  Next “it’s like a miracle - it will disappear.”  Then the whole thing is a “hoax.”  Now America is “at war.”  Dude you’re all over the place.  PIPE DOWN.
Trump claims that the Coronavirus is under control.   It is not.   The President needs to either step up and speak the truth #SocialDistancing.  Or get out of the way.  FACTS.
Virtual Coronavirus Town Hall Meeting starting now.  https://t.co/UBR5Ok1sxm

Don’t forget our Coronavirus Virtual Town Hall mtg TONIGHT @ 5:00 pm.  Join us on Facebook or YouTube.   Tweet me your questions or leave them in the Facebook or YouTube comments section.  We will defeat this pandemic together!  https://t.co/cbEuqI9swn  https://t.co/jkRZrESHBr https://t.co/9I5YjUYb8E

Harry Truman: “The buck stops here.”  Barack Obama: “As President I take responsibility for that.”  Donald Trump: “I don’t take responsibility at all.”  COVID-19 is a devastating virus.   We need real leadership not dereliction of duty.

The coronavirus is serious.  We’re hosting a Virtual Town Hall mtg tomorrow with local experts and policymakers to discuss the response.  Join us on Facebook or YouTube this Sunday at 5:00 p.m.  And get your questions ready.  https://t.co/rmhOFi7yn7  https://t.co/jkRZrESHBr https://t.co/fhmNdgetuE

House passes wide-ranging Coronavirus relief package #ForThePeople.  It’s time for the Senate to #DoYourJob.  End your weekend vacation Mitch.  Get back to Washington.  This is a matter of life or death.   https://t.co/2aw5XoPUrN

Free Coronavirus testing for everyone ✅   Paid emergency sick leave ✅   Unemployment benefits for displaced workers  ✅   Strengthened food security ✅   Increased Medicaid support for states and localities ✅   House Dems will deliver  #ForThePeople.
President Trump will speak to the nation this evening.  Question.  Do you still believe the worldwide coronavirus pandemic is a Democratic hoax?
Ignorant and Xenophobic.  The global epidemic is called COVID-19 Kevin.  But one thing is clear.  The President’s stunning incompetence may lead to the #TrumpRecession. https://t.co/Htd8sGHBGZ

Thousands have died #Coronavirus.  The stock market has collapsed.  Recession may be imminent.  And the so-called President spent the weekend at a Florida golf resort.   Pathetic. https://t.co/grWXjpR849
Trump sycophants could care less about the facts related to COVID-19.  The #Coronavirus is not contained.  It is spreading like wildfire.  Stop lying to the American people.

Americans are dying from the #Coronavirus.  The stock market is in free fall.  Tornadoes have ravaged parts of the Southeast.  And Donald Trump is back on vacation in Florida.   Make America Great Again? What. A. Fraud.
Time is of the essence.  We must act swiftly.  And do all we can to protect the health and well-being of the American people.  #Coronavirus https://t.co/WWQjlcGcvy
The Coronavirus has killed more than 2900 people.  This is a global epidemic.  It’s not a hoax.  The American people don’t need reckless rhetoric.   We. Need. Results.
CoronaVirus is spiraling out of control.  The stock market is in free fall.  Trump Budget seeks deep cuts to Centers for Disease Control.    Lives are at risk.  Get. Your. Act. Together. Donald.
